collabpadsessions-admin: Title for special page {{My CollabPads Sessions}} for admins
collabpads-content-action-text: Label for the "Edit together" edit action
collabpads-content-action-tooltip: Tooltip for the Edit collaboratively action
collabpads-start-dialog-title: Title for the start session dialog
collabpads-start-dialog-message: Text in the start session dialog
collabpads-start-dialog-show-again:
Label for "Don"t show this message again"
{{Identical|Don"t show this message again}}
collabpads-toolbar-save-button:
Label for the save button in toolbar
{{Identical|Save changesâ€¦}}
collabpads-save-dialog-title:
Title for the save dialog
{{Identical|Save your changes}}
collabpads-save-dialog-save-button:
Label for save button in save dialog
{{Identical|Save changes}}
collabpads-save-dialog-minor-edit:
Label for "This is a minor edit"
{{Identical|This is a minor edit}}
collabpads-save-dialog-watch-page:
Label for "Watch this page"
{{Identical|Watch this page}}
collabpads-leave-dialog-title: Title of the leave dialog after clicking the CollabPad session leave button
collabpads-leave-dialog-leave-button: Text in the leave session button in the leave dialog after clicking the CollabPad session leave button
collabpads-leave-dialog-message: Leave session message in the leave dialog after clicking the CollabPad session leave button
collabpads-reset-changes-dialog-title: Title for the reset changes dialog
collabpads-reset-changes-dialog-message: Text in the reset changes dialog
collabpads-reset-changes-dialog-reset-ch: Label for the reset button in the reset changes dialog
collabpads-reset-changes-tooltip: Tooltip for the reset changes button
collabpads-dialog-cancel-button:
Label for the cancel button in the dialogs
{{Identical|Cancel}}
collabpads-copylink-label: Label for the copy invite link
collabpads-recentchangesflags-letter: Legend for the Recent Changes CollabPads flag letter
collabpads-recentchangesflags-title: Flag (letter) to show on Recent Changes next to the lines that represent edits to CollabPads
collabpads-recentchangesflags-legend: Title (tooltip) to show the Recent Changes CollabPads flag letter
collabpads-clipboard-copy-success: Notification message after clicking the copy invitation link button and the URL copied successfully
collabpads-clipboard-copy-fail: Notification message after clicking the copy invitation link and the URL failed to copy
collabpads-author-join:
Notification message after a user has joined the current session. Parameters:
* $1 - The user joining the session
collabpads-author-leave:
Notification message after a user has left the current session. Parameters:
* $1 - The user leaving the session
collabpads-author-save:
Notification message after a user has saved. Parameters:
* $1 - The user saving
collabpads-already-participating-title: Title of the already participating dialog after trying to join the same session again
collabpads-already-participating-message: Text in the already participating dialog after trying to join the same session again
collabpads-bs-saferedit-editing:
Text in the BlueSpiceSaferEdit banner for the page being edited. Parameters:
* $1 - contains the link to edit the page
collabpads-bs-saferedit-editing-link-tex: Text for the link to join the collaborative editing session in the BlueSpiceSaferEdit banner
collabpads-normal-edit-blocked: Message which is shown in VE during normal edit, if there is already a collaborative session running on the page
collabpads-save-complete-notif: Toast notification when a page is saved
collabpads-last-edit-info:
Last edit sentence with author, date and "& others". Parameters:
* $1 - date of the last edit
* $2 - author of the last edit
collabpads-out-of-sync: Shown when the client is out of sync with the server
collabpads-invalid-change-dialog-title: Title of the invalid change dialog
collabpads-invalid-change-dialog-message: Message in the invalid change dialog
collabpads-session-ended-title: Title of the session ended dialog
collabpads-session-ended-message: Message in the session ended dialog
collabpads-invalid-initialization-dialog: Title of the invalid initialization dialog
Message in the invalid initialization dialog
